DOC.brief_summary: The objective study investigate whether treatment direct neck shoulder beneficial treatment direct solely shoulder ; patient shoulder impingement syndrome . ( The hypothesis patient receive neck mobilization improve significant rate receive neck mobilization )
DOC.detailed_description: All treatment provide licensed physical therapist within United States . The clinician affiliate study experience data collection participate recent trial sponsor Walsh University . At baseline , consent study , patient randomize two group : 1 ) shoulder treatment active mobilization neck 2 ) shoulder treatment placebo mobilization neck . Baseline data collect include self-report measure . Both group receive shoulder treatment emphasis 1 ) range motion activity , 2 ) joint mobilization , 3 ) rotator cuff strengthen 4 ) home exercise program consist shoulder strengthen exercise . The active neck group receive UPA 's cervical spine ; apply 3 X 30 second , comparable ( stiff painful ) segment . The physical therapist place hand neck patient placebo group perform oscillation characteristic mobilization . All patient receive home program design increase range motion strength . None home program focus exercise target neck . The shoulder exercise tailor specific patient standardize . Patients treat duration care use focus ( 1 ) range motion activity , 2 ) joint mobilization , 3 ) rotator cuff strengthen 4 ) home exercise program consist shoulder strengthen exercise ) . The length treatment determine progress patient attend therapist .
DOC.criteria: Patients , age 18 old , shoulder impingement syndrome , attend care physical therapy outpatient setting , screen eligibility study treat physical therapist . For patient meet inclusion requirement , require follow : 1 . Report pain dysfunction elevate ( overhead ) arm activity , Demonstrate pain active shoulder movement 2 . Demonstrate positive Neer Hawkins Kennedy Test 3 . Report onset nontraumatic 4 . Report onset within last 12 month 5 . Demonstrate painful arc movement forward elevation arm 60° 120° Exclusion criterion include The presence red flag ( i.e. , tumor , metabolic disease , rheumatoid arthritis , osteoporosis , prolonged history steroid use , etc . ) , history frozen shoulder , disorder acromioclavicular joint , degenerative arthritis glenohumeral joint , calcify tendonitis , shoulder instability , posttraumatic disorder , shoulder surgery and/or elbow , hand , wrist blatantly misdiagnosed cervical spine disorder ( e.g. , cervical radiculopathy ) .
